meanings: 대화 도중 That can't be right.

vlive.korean: 그럴리가 있어? Is that possible? 듣기 View video PARK JI HOON : HAPPY MAY BIRTHDAY🎂
[오호 그럴 리가~?] 모른 척... [That can't happen...] You're pretending... 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [MMMTV6] EP13 비글로 돌아온 마마무
[그럴 리가... 알지 알지 민기 미자 맞지] 모르셨죠? [I know, you're a minor] You didn't know it, right? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NU'EST] 어 그래 너.. 잘 살았다..! 이날 이때까지 울 망고했으니..! (REN playing with fans)
vlive.english: [I know, you're a minor] You didn't know it, right?

vlive.korean: 에이 그럴리가요 안녕! Hey, come on. Hi! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 45
[다시 돌고] [그럴 리가!] [It goes on and on] [No way!] View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : [4회] '(경건)또 가는구나..(해탈)' 롤러코스터 무한루프

examples.korean: Paul? Apologize? That’ll be the day! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 폴이? 사과를 한다구? 그럴 리가 있나! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Paul? Apologize? That’ll be the day! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Do you think he’ll do it?’ ‘No chance.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그가 그걸 할 거라고 생각하니?” “그럴 리 없어.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Do you think he’ll do it?’ ‘No chance.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I'll be dashed if it is so. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 만일 그렇다면 내 목을 내놓겠다((절대로 그럴 리 없다)). Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I'll be dashed if it is so. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The hell you say! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 설마 그럴 리가 있나. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hell you say! Add to Wordbook
